about_the_game:
Paint yer truck wi' a choice o' 8 gentleman o' fortune themed paint jobs!

  • Pirate Flag Decal
  • Ghost Ship
  • Pirate Flag Metallic
  • Skull and Swords
  • Pirate Gods
  • Pirate Ahoy!
  • Pirate Ship
  • Pirate Shipreck

All o' these themes be applicable t' any in-game truck except fer 8x4 chassis configurations.

Bonus toys t' decorate yer truck cabin wi':

  • Pirate bobblehead
  • Parrot bobblehead
  • Ship in a bottle
  • Pirate Flag
  • Skull with cutlasses
detailed_description:
Paint yer truck wi' a choice o' 8 gentleman o' fortune themed paint jobs!

  • Pirate Flag Decal

  • Pirate Ship
  • Pirate Shipreck

All o' these themes be applicable t' any in-game truck except fer 8x4 chassis configurations.

Bonus toys t' decorate yer truck cabin wi':

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

short_description: Paint yer truck wi' a choice o' 8 gentleman o' fortune themed paint jobs an' decorate yer truck cabin wi' toys!
